11.label: LED frame colour when moving
11.description: This parameter defines the LED colour when the motor is running.

12.label: LED frame – colour when not moving
12.description: This parameter defines the LED colour when the device motor is not running.

13.label: LED frame – brightness
13.description: This parameter allows to adjust the LED frame brightness.

24.label: Buttons orientation
24.description: This parameter allows reversing the operation of the buttons.

25.label: Outputs orientation
25.description: reversing the operation of Q1 and Q2

30.label: Alarm configuration - 1st slot
30.description: Which alarm frames and how the device should react

31.label: Alarm configuration - 2nd slot
31.description: which alarm frames and how the device should react

32.label: Alarm configuration - 3rd slot
32.description: which alarm frames and how the device should react

33.label: Alarm configuration - 4th slot
33.description: which alarm frames and how the device should react

34.label: Alarm configuration - 5th slot
34.description: which alarm frames and how the device should react

40.label: First button – scenes sent
40.description: which actions result in sending scene IDs

41.label: Second button – scenes sent
41.description: which actions result in sending scene IDs

61.label: Power reports – on change
61.description: minimal change in measured power to report

65.label: Energy reports – on change
65.description: minimal change in measured energy to report

66.label: Energy reports – periodic
66.description: This reporting interval for measured energy

150.label: Force calibration
150.description: Set 2 to force device into calibration mode

151.label: Operating mode
151.description: This parameter allows adjusting operation ac-cording to the connected device.

152.label: Venetian blind – time of full turn of the slats

153.label: Set slats back to previous position

154.label: Delay motor stop after reaching end switch
154.description: time after which the motor will be stopped after contacts closed

155.label: Motor operation detection
155.description: Power threshold interpreted as reaching a limit switch.

156.label: Time of up movement
156.description: time needed for roller blinds to reach the top

157.label: Time of down movement
157.description: time needed for roller blinds to reach the bottom
